an10.5:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi …pe…
an10.5:1.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ;
an10.5:1.4: pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti;
an10.5:1.5: pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi;
an10.5:1.6: passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sukhaṃ;
an10.5:1.7: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi;
an10.5:1.8: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
an10.5:1.9: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an10.5:1.10: nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an10.5:1.11: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṃ gacchati.
an10.5:1.12: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro;
an10.5:2.1: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
an10.5:2.2: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti pāmojjaṃ;
an10.5:2.3: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti;
an10.5:2.4: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi;
an10.5:2.5: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sukhaṃ;
an10.5:2.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi;
an10.5:2.7: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ;
an10.5:2.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo;
an10.5:2.9: nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an10.5:2.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṃ gacchati.
an10.5:2.11: Evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro;
